title.en: Basic Knowledge for the Research in Immunology I

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Course gives knowledge about the general principles and ethics of scientific investigations, about safety regulations related to the work in laboratory, about scientific methodology and statistics. Course gives basic knowledge about principles of antigen-antibody interactions in immunological test prototypes. Students are acknowledged about ongoing scientific projects in the Chair. Students are oblidged to write an essay about a topic related to one of lab's scientific projects. Their task is also to determine antibody status in a patients' group as well as among controls and to analyse the results and present a topic on Chair's seminar.
description.et: Õpetatakse immunoloogias kasutusel olevaid laboratoorseid meetodeid. Eeldab suures osas ka iseseisvat tööd teaduskirjandusega.

objectives.en: To get general principles of research in immunology (I stage).
objectives.et: Omandada immunoloogia-alase teadustöö üldisi kogemusi (I aste).

learning_outcomes.en: At the end of the course, within the syllabus, a student:
learning_outcomes.et: Õppeaine läbimise järgselt, vastavalt programmile, üliõpilane:

learning_outcomes.en: 1. knows principles of research ethics taking into account specific aspects in immunology;
learning_outcomes.et: 1. teab teadustöö eetika põhimõtteid arvestades immunoloogia eripära;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. is acquainted with expanded up-to-date knowledge about immunology and it's research methods;
learning_outcomes.et: 2. on omandanud mitmekülgsed teadmised kaasaegsest immunoloogiast ja selle teaduslike meetodite põhimõtetest;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. is able critically analyze the modern immunological literature in a specific field and is able to write about this a scientific review;
learning_outcomes.et: 3. oskab kriitiliselt analüüsida kaasaegses meditsiinilise immunoloogia erialakirjandust, analüüsides ühe kitsa valdkonna teaduspublikatsioone, kirjutades selle põhjal teadusliku referaadi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. present these data in a short concise oral presentation in special seminar.
learning_outcomes.et: 4. esitab referaadis toodud andmeid ja tulemusi lühiettekandes spetsiaalsel seminaril.

independent_work.et: A term paper and an oral presentation

grade_preconditions.et:
NB! Course lasts two semesters.
For final grading a term paper and seminar presentation are obligatory (Dates 28.02 and 31.05)

grade_evaluation.et: The final grading depends on term paper and oral presentation in workshop (passed/non-passed)

debt_elimination.et: According to Study Regulations, in agreement with teaching staff.
